titleStmt.title: The true Catholicks tenure, or, A good Christians certainty which he ought to have of his religion, and may have of his salvation by Edvvard Hyde ...
titleStmt.author: Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659.
Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659. Allegiance and conscience not fled out of England.

notesStmt.note: Includes: Allegiance and conscience not fled out of England ... / by Edw. Hyde. Cambridge : Printed by John Field ..., 1662.
Allegiance and conscience has separate t.p. and pagination, but signatures are continuous.
"Allegiance and conscience not fled out of England" formerly Wing H3861. Wing (2nd ed.) identifies this as part of Hyde's The true Catholicks tenure (H3868).
Item at reel 538:17 is "Allegiance and conscience not fled out of England" only.
Reproductions of original in Cambridge University Library.
